intro: Carum yunnanense, commonly known as Yunnan caraway, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Apiaceae family, which includes parsley and dill, and is characterized by its umbellate inflorescences. The plant produces small, white to pale yellow flowers and has aromatic, pinnately divided leaves. It is often found in mountainous regions and is valued for its medicinal properties in traditional Chinese medicine. Carum yunnanense is also used as a spice in some culinary applications.
